## üìö Documentation

Before seeking support, please check our comprehensive documentation:

| Resource | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| [Getting Started](../docs/GETTING-STARTED.md) | Quick start guide for new users |
| [Installation Guide](../docs/INSTALLATION.md) | Detailed installation instructions |

| [Glossary](../docs/GLOSSARY.md) | Terms and definitions |

---

## üêõ Bug Reports

Found a bug? Please report it through GitHub Issues:

1. Search [existing issues](https://github.com/B0yZ4kr14/TSiJUKEBOX/issues) first
2. If not found, [create a new issue](https://github.com/B0yZ4kr14/TSiJUKEBOX/issues/new?template=bug_report.md)
3. Use the bug report template
4. Include:
   - Steps to reproduce
   - Expected vs actual behavior
   - Screenshots if applicable
   - System information

---

## üí° Feature Requests

Have an idea for improvement?

1. Check [existing feature requests](https://github.com/B0yZ4kr14/TSiJUKEBOX/issues?q=is%3Aissue+label%3Aenhancement)
2. [Submit a feature request](https://github.com/B0yZ4kr14/TSiJUKEBOX/issues/new?template=feature_request.md)
3. Describe:
   - The problem you're trying to solve
   - Your proposed solution
   - Alternative solutions considered

---

## üí¨ Community Support

### GitHub Discussions

For general questions and community discussions:
- [Start a discussion](https://github.com/B0yZ4kr14/TSiJUKEBOX/discussions)

### Categories:
- **Q&A**: Ask questions and get answers
- **Ideas**: Share ideas for improvements
- **Show and Tell**: Share your TSiJUKEBOX setup
- **General**: General conversation

---

## üîí Security Issues

**‚ö†Ô∏è Do not report security vulnerabilities through public issues.**

Please read our [Security Policy](SECURITY.md) for instructions on reporting security issues responsibly.

---

## üìß Contact

For matters that can't be handled through GitHub:

- **General Inquiries**: Create a GitHub Discussion
- **Security Issues**: See [SECURITY.md](SECURITY.md)
- **Contributions**: See [CONTRIBUTING.md](../docs/CONTRIBUTING.md)

---

## ü§ù Contributing

Interested in contributing? We welcome all contributions!

- Read the [Contributing Guide](../docs/CONTRIBUTING.md)
- Check [good first issues](https://github.com/B0yZ4kr14/TSiJUKEBOX/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22good+first+issue%22)
- Follow our [Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)

---

## ‚è∞ Response Times

| Channel | Expected Response |
|---------|-------------------|
| Bug Reports | 1-3 business days |
| Feature Requests | 3-7 business days |
| Security Issues | Within 48 hours |
| General Questions | 3-5 business days |

*Note: Response times may vary. We're a small team and appreciate your patience.*
